## MasterHandle.getFolderLocation property

get the location (ie. metadata id) of a folder

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFolderLocation: (dir: string) => string;
```

## Remarks

this is a deterministic location derived from the account's hdkey to allow for random folder access
